sanskrit_data’s documentation¶

You’ll find a concise introduction to this project in the project README.md file at our github root .

Sub-modules in decreasing order of interest are:

  • schema, where interesting Python classes (with corresponding json schema for [de]serialization) are provided.
  • db, where a common interface for accessing various databases is provided.

Please view the respective documentations for details.

  • sanskrit_data.schema
    • sanskrit_data.schema.common
    • sanskrit_data.schema.books
    • sanskrit_data.schema.ullekhanam
    • sanskrit_data.schema.users
  • sanskrit_data.db
    • sanskrit_data.db.mongodb
    • sanskrit_data.db.couchdb
